data.text/plain:
Universal Dataset Number: 15

  [1mName: Nodes[22m

  [36m         Record 1: FORMAT(4I10,1P3E13.5)[39m
  [36m                   Field 1   -  node label[39m
  [36m                   Field 2   -  definition coordinate system number[39m
  [36m                   Field 3   -  displacement coordinate system number[39m
  [36m                   Field 4   -  color[39m
  [36m                   Field 5-7 -  3 - Dimensional coordinates of node[39m
  [36m                                in the definition system[39m
  
  [36m         NOTE:  Repeat record for each node[39m

data.text/markdown:
```julia
Dataset15
```

A struct containing UFF Dataset 15 metadata.

**Fields**

  * `type::Symbol`: Data set type
  * `node_ID::Vector{Int}`: Node label
  * `def_cs_num::Vector{Int}`: Definition coordinate system number
  * `disp_cs_num::Vector{Int}`: Displacement coordinate system number
  * `color::Vector{Int}`: Color
  * `coords::Vector{Vector{Float64}}`: 3D coordinates of node in the definition system
data.text/html:
Dataset15

A struct containing UFF Dataset 15 metadata.

Fields

  • type::Symbol: Data set type

  • node_ID::Vector{Int}: Node label

  • def_cs_num::Vector{Int}: Definition coordinate system number

  • disp_cs_num::Vector{Int}: Displacement coordinate system number

  • color::Vector{Int}: Color

  • coords::Vector{Vector{Float64}}: 3D coordinates of node in the definition system
